location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from Thomas H Sheridan, Acting Public Secretary at Tauris to Stephen Babington Esquire, in Charge of the Residency at Bushire

mods.abstract: Letter from Thomas H Sheridan, Acting Public Secretary at Tauris [Tabriz, Iran] to Stephen Babington Esquire, in Charge of the Residency at Bushire, enclosing a packet containing letters of Her Majesty's Envoy to be delivered to Francis Warden at Bombay, and requesting to transmit to Arratoon any packets addressed to Sir Harford Jones arriving from Bombay.
